content: *this hip and relaxed hobo-style bag features a funky ring accent approx 14 in 35 5 cm wide x 25 in 63 5 cm tall shown in bernat handicrafter cotton twists denim twists #41117 crochet using size 4 mm u s g/6 hook yarnspirations * materials needed bernat handicrafter cotton twists 42 5 g/1 5 oz 7 balls #41117 denim twists -or lily sugar n cream twists 56 7 g/2 oz 6 balls #20117 denim twists -additional materials size 4 mm u s g/6 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge plastic ring 3 ins 7 5 cm in diameter for decoration **available in different versions ** *handicrafter cotton twists* hobo bag 1 french version pdf modified july 2007 not found online spanish version 2 *lily sugar n cream twists* bag 3 french version not found online *lily sugar n cream free project sheet 99000600308* *crochet bag* english *sac au crochet* french 1 https //www yarnspirations com/bernat-hobo-bag/brc0103-003077m html 2 http //com yarnspirations pattern-pdfs s3 amazonaws com/bernat_handicraftercottontwists405_cr_bag es_mx pdf 3 https //www yarnspirations com/lily-sugarn-cream-bag/scc0103-003071m html
